channel.description: Recent content on Introduction to Syzygy

item.title: Introduction to Syzygy
item.description: syzygy.ca is a project of the Pacific Institute for the Mathematical Sciences, Compute Canada and Cybera to bring Jupyter notebooks to researchers, educators and innovators across Canada. This site is a brief introduction on how to use these computing tools. Get started (Image credit: European Southern Observatory) Syzygy is pronounced like the start of “Sizzle” – sizz eh gee. It means the alignment of three or more celestial objects.
